Terms and Conditions for Quote


Validity: This quote is valid for 30 days from the date of issue unless otherwise stated. Prices and terms are subject to change after this period.

Payment Terms: Full payment is due within 30 days of invoice date unless alternate terms are agreed in writing. Late payments may incur interest charges.

Taxes and Duties: All applicable taxes, duties, and levies are not included in the quoted price unless explicitly stated.

Delivery Timeline: Estimated delivery or service commencement timelines will be communicated upon confirmation of the order. Delays due to unforeseen circumstances will be addressed in good faith.

Cancellation Policy: Orders may be canceled within 5 business days of acceptance, subject to applicable cancellation fees.

Limitation of Liability: The issuing company shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages related to the products or services quoted.

Confidentiality: Both parties agree to keep confidential information in strict confidence and not disclose it to third parties without prior written consent.

Governing Law: This quote and any resulting agreement will be governed by the laws of the jurisdiction in which the issuing company is registered.
